metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: opcodes/rx-decode.opc in GNU Binutils 2.28 lacks bounds checks for certainscale arrays, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by mishandling of thisfile during "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
